bundle-i18n.description: Bundle i18n resources (deployed to multiple locations)

game-configs.description: Game configuration files (preserves existing files in root)

notes: clearBeforeDeploy: Whether to delete existing files in target directory before deploying
skipRootDir: If true and ZIP contains single root directory, skip that directory
findInternalDir: Look for this specific directory inside extracted content (for bundle-i18n)
additionalTargets: Deploy to these additional directories (relative to deploy bucket root)
preserveOtherFiles: If true, only overwrite deployed files, keep other files intact
targetPrefix: Relative path from deploy bucket root. Empty string means deploy to root.
